Sunway International Schools Kuala Lumpur (SISKL) embraces the belief in the transformative power of education, offering a holistic experience that prepares students for a global future. This belief can be experienced first-hand at the upcoming Open Day on 21 September 2024, Saturday, from 10:00am to 3:30pm at Sunway City Kuala Lumpur.
